alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 08 at 9:03PM PST until March 10 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in California... Russian River near Hopland affecting Southeastern Mendocino Interior zone. For the Russian River...including Hopland...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Russian River near Hopland. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Flooding of Highway 175 is expected at the approaches to the Russian River bridge. Expect flooding of cropland on the right bank of river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM PST Wednesday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/eka. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 515 AM PST.
